channel.title: Simplicity is a form of art... - documents

item.title: Majority of GDP documents moved to Gentoo wiki
item.description: The majority of the English gentoo documents that resided in www.gentoo.org/doc/en have now been moved to the Gentoo Wiki. All those documents have been made available in the main namespace, meaning that non-developers can continue to contribute on those articles and guides, fully in the spirit â€¦
item.dc:creator: Sven Vermeulen
